raw_body: Dearly beloved husband of Nirmala and loving father of Sasanka and Gayan (Australia), father-in-law to Shenuk and loving grandfather to Mikael and Arlina, loving brother of late Channa, late Anoma, Madara, Ruwan, Bimba and Menaka, brother-in-law of Parakrama, Thilak, Sunil, Sarath, Kanchana, Sulochana, late Colin, late Vinitha, Mallika, late Sisira and late Upali, passed away peacefully on Monday, 19th February 2024.
